none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 13, 2016 Description from Terminal Escape:
Four creamers. Eight minutes. Redlined UK hardcore with vocals pushed beyond any reasonable version of belief. Easy to imagine this shit going off the rails live, and you will definitely want to fukk with the guitar in "Insanity Of War." Actually, you're just going to want to fukk with the whole damn tape. Not one second of bullshit contained in today's download. You're welcome. SLUR

seo.title: Slur - Slur demo 2015 - Terminal Escape
